title: Drawing, 1938-88-1838
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash
markings: Verso: Cooper Union Museum for the Arts of Decoration (Lugt#457d)
provenance: Ex collection: Piancastelli and Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: Vertical rectangle. Two angels fly on either side, the left one supporting with his left arm a wreath on top, the right one carries flowers in his right hand. The angels are connected by a festoon. The background is slightly colored. Written in the upper right corner: "71".
